message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $10,000. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $18,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $14,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I'm sorry, but I still feel that $14,000 is beyond my budget. I would like to propose $12,000 as a potential compromise. Would you be willing to consider this?
